Reviews.Title: “Too far away from the centre, rooms and towels were smelly”
Reviews.Author: Nausika_82
Reviews.Content: hotel located city centre walk 2 busses bussubway especially evening fewer busses metro available view walls smell cigarettes towels bathroom awful chemical smell breakfast poor pool available julyaugust hotel didnt live 4 hotel nh standards

Reviews.Title: “Good and not so far from Vatican”
Reviews.Author: sranda
Reviews.Content: hotel located quiet green 2 km vatican city please aware located hill taxi walking tiring outdoor swimming pool closed october average size ok cant complain cleanliness breakfast limited choice hot meals choice pastries sweets sum hotel reasonable price

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights pre cruise hotel sunday flight boston check accomodate little sleep couples coming arrived front desk couldnt dealings giuseppe commended 3rd floor foot traffic quietthe adequate 2 furniture carpeting lobby furniture bit dinner hada 1015 euro cab ride stay recommend center day sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: LankyB
Reviews.Content: negative reviews huge american style hotel bent backwards please clean outdated breakfast included located beaten path quiet thats 10 euro cab ride vatican dont stay noisy grafitti filled mcdonalds walking distance ignore negative reviews plus reasonably priced stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Not near anything !”

Reviews.Content: recent trip rome stayed hotel 2 nights disappointed location terrible close walking distance vatican city hike lobby impressive thats carpet halls buffet breakfast left desired kept running food coffee coffee cups ate dinner night hotel expensive location money recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: basically clean decor updating furnishings outdated little worn north american 4 star standard breakfast buffett short walk mini grocery store eatery overall terribly bad stay 3 nights
